string.name: changelog_master
string.Data:
Nightly build:

Map:

  • Fix: Missing information (eg.: hint) for stored caches when in live map mode
  • Change: Moved \"Combined (Offline)\" map entry to top of offline maps
  • Fix: Remove temporary downloaded map file after successful copy to c:geo
  • Fix: Individual route: Update distance on item removal
  • New: Added attribution to contributors on OpenStreetMap maps

Cache details:

  • Change: Combine note and user note for export waypoint to GPX, on import split them up
  • New: provide direct log link ability for gc.com/oc.*/gc.su
  • Change: Disable cache detail share menu for user-defined caches
  • New: Support [TYPE] in signature
  • Fix: Hint is not displayed on compass view, when launched directly from map
  • New: Image upload on logging: always remove EXIF data
  • New: Image upload on logging: allow resorting images
  • New: Waypoint calculator: add option to lower-case all variables
  • Fix: Update list of waypoints on extract waypoints

Cache lists:

  • New: Improved performance for filtering large cache lists

Other:

  • Change: Backup / restore caches and settings in one step
  • New: Preserve multiple backups of caches and settings
  • Fix: GPX export of position history: timestamps are now GMT-based
  • New: GPX export of position history: added elevation info
  • New: Set/read GSAK "user defined waypoint" flag on GPX export/import (if applicable)
  • New: Format GPX export file more human-readable
  • Fix: Export waypoints even if they have no coordinates
  • Change: Throw a runtime error if db can neither be opened nor created
  • New: Automatically convert geocode search input to upper case
  • Change: Updated widget icons
  • Updated list of contributors
